Does it happen every time?  What are the steps needed to make it happe?

Created an attachment (id=56674)
example rcp app showing the problem

launch via app.product

The problem is not 100% reproducible, but will be reproducible if given time.

Click on the button lots of times, open the progress view w/ the button in the status line, cancel and remove finished tasks.

Alternate between canceling, removing, creating jobs after an indeterminate time the exception will be logged to the console.
